summary: when being asked why I would enjoy working in the area of supply chain, my answer is always like that. I like to connect the right things with the right people and see product or service delivered at the right time at the right place. Eventually, all leads to satisfactions for stakeholders, and I am one of them.

projects.title: Sourcing Project, Master Data Maintenance Transfer Project, Forward Looking Excellence Project, New Product Introduction for Penstamps.com

profile_positions.description:
•	Material requirement planning
1.	To plan spare parts demand in EU region for CTOS (Configure-To-Order Stock).
2.	To plan work orders in EU region based on service level agreement.
•	Project support
1.	To improve order fulfilment by identifying the bottleneck and advising logistics plans.
2.	To work with sales, PM, QA and production team to optimize delivery schedule.
3.	To coordinate logistics flow from factories to regional or customer warehouses. 
•	Inventory management and optimization
1.	To improve material availability by analysing demand plans and reviewing stock level. 
2.	To review slow-moving/obsolete stock and take corrective actions with stakeholders.
 Data management
1. To maintain material master data in SAP.
2. To edit and sort out work instructions according to ISO procedure.
 To provide advice on SAP operations with general user as first line support.
 To achieve inventory KPI such as DOH within 21 days and 6.2% of stock age over 120 days.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Analyze and adjust demand forecast by applying sales history and projects.
•	Manage purchase orders to optimise both service level and safety stock level, in a multi site(warehouse) environment.
•	Minimize logistical costs through optimal and timely choice of transport options, purchase order frequency and size.
•	Review forecast accuracy and raise issues to sales team.
•	Analyze and respond to over-forecast requests and spot orders in EMEA.
•	Improve inventory performance by analyzing and proposing possible solutions to sales and management team.
•	Monthly report on back order and slow moving items; then take actions accordingly.
•	Weekly prioritize incoming containers with logistics parties.
profile_positions.title: Demand Supply Planner

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	System and process support in business line.
1.	Monitored supply situation and provided early warning towards relevant Operations in order to speed up production.
2.	Identified root causes of forecast changes and impact when forecast changes; further advised on actions needed.
3.	Analysed root cause of planning problem and make the necessary change in Master Data or SAP to influence the planning result.
4.	Analysed planning problems by crossing checking BW reports.
5.	Advised on actions needed when there is mismatch between supply and demand.
6.	Maintained master data such as BOM, supply chain and stock when necessary.
•	Reporting Support.
1.	Provided weekly KPI to review performances of stock, delivery and basic data.
2.	Simplified the process of BBSC dashboard.
•	Project involvement.
1.	Master data maintenance transfer from Germany to Taiwan.
2.	Sourcing project to drive planning result met with sourcing requirements.
3.	Produced ad-hoc reports to look forward projected inventory and further advised necessary actions.
Achievements: 
•	Reached 95% of solving rate per on-duty service. Response time is 1.5 days.
•	Created an inventory report to give forward looking perspectives on the subject of inventory management.
Competences:
•	SAP Experience.
•	Project management and quality maintenance.
•	Problem-solving and logical thinking.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant / Order Fulfillment Center

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Logistics Management
1.	Hit on-time delivery by organising schedules of stock and materials.
2.	Managed retailer’s back order and arranged item priorities with logistics parties.
3.	Evaluated logistics quote with finance section to minimise logistics cost.
4.	Liaised with logistic company about all matters of import and export.
•	Demand Management
1.	Worked closely with production planning to check delivery schedule of orders.
2.	Planned and ordered spare parts for local repairing companies.
3.	Managed demo units for customer review.
•	Customer Relation Management
1.	Took initiatively to persuade customer to review new products.
2.	Provided technical supports with customers at the first line.
3.	Arranged replacements for units dead on arrival.
Achievements: 
•	Negotiated storage fee with external warehouse.
•	Worked with D&J Henry Ltd to reduce repair LT from 7-14 to 3 days.
Competences:
•	ERP Experience.
•	Organizational skills to get things done.
•	Good listening and communication skills between clients and technical support.
profile_positions.title: Customer Support / Order Fulfillment

profile_positions.description:
* Studied a broad range of business related subjects including: Strategic Marketing; Project Management; Strategy and Operations; People Management; Supply Chain and Logistics Management; Quality and Reliability; Manufacturing Technology and Financial Analysis.
* M.Sc Dissertation: Market research for New Product Introduction (NPI) and Applying Web 2.0 Technology (i.e. Facebook, Twitter, wretch.cc) to marketing as well as identify new opportunities to business.
The research is cooperated with SME, Penstamps.com and focused on maximising social networking resources to build up product awareness, to collect market intelligence for identifying customers’ needs, and further to identify market gaps, eventually to create competitive advantages for SMEs.
profile_positions.title: Postgraduate

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Reported to country manager about supply and demand planning:
1.	Demand Planning: Analysed historical data to adjust demand forecast; further to be an input of procurement. 
2.	Supply Planning: Planned ahead to ensure core products to be delivered on time. For back order or short supply, seek for available stock from other territories.
3.	Inventory management: Developed simulation tool to perform up-to-date information about supply and demand; further implement this concept into SAP.
•	Worked with global production planning in stock management, specially aged stock and phased-out items.
•	Liaised with internal and external suppliers about logistics.
Achievements: 
•	Collaborated with IT outsourcing to customise inventory management in SAP.
•	Remained Inventory turnover for monthly new products as 12-24 times.
Competences:
•	SAP Experience.
•	Logical thinking and analytical capabilities.
•	Experience with logistics and inventory management.
profile_positions.title: Product Planner

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•       Looked for certain accounting records from SAP.
•	Collected and filed data for the budget plan and R&D tax reduction project.
•	Functioned as a guide to introduce the products in Computer Fairs.
•	Hosted road show events to enhance product exposure.
•	Worked as shop salesman to promote X-Box and games.
Competency:
•	SAP Experience, Organizational skills
•	Public presentation skills, icebreaking talk skills, flexibility and high mobility.
profile_positions.title: Microsoft Internship
